title: Work glove

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a work glove, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front and left side perspective view of a work glove showing our new design;
FIG. 2 is a rear and left side perspective view;
FIG. 3 is a front elevational view;
FIG. 4 is a right side elevational view;
FIG. 5 is a left side elevational View˜,
FIG. 6 is a rear side elevational view;
FIG. 7 is a top plan view;
FIG. 8 is a bottom plan view; and,
FIG. 9 is a partially enlarged view of a palm portion in perspective view.
